verses.verse: Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, If a <S%H802>woman<s%> conceive <S%H2232>seed<s%>, and <S%H3205>bear<s%> a <S%H2145>man-child<s%>, then she shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>; as in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H5079>impurity<s%> of her <S%H1738>sickness<s%> shall she be <S%H2930>unclean<s%>.
And in the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of his <S%H6190>foreskin<s%> shall be <S%H4135>circumcised<s%>.

And she shall <S%H3427>continue<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of her <S%H2893>purifying<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>; she shall <S%H5060>touch<s%> no <S%H6944>hallowed<s%> <S%H935>thing<s%>, nor come into the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>, until the <S%H3117>days<s%> of her <S%H2892>purifying<s%> be <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%>.

But if she <S%H3205>bear<s%> a <S%H5347>maid-child<s%>, then she shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> two <S%H7620>weeks<s%>, as in her <S%H5079>impurity<s%>; and she shall <S%H3427>continue<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of her <S%H2893>purifying<s%> <S%H8346>threescore<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.

And when the <S%H3117>days<s%> of her <S%H2892>purifying<s%> are <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%>, for a <S%H1121>son<s%>, or for a <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, she shall <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H3532>lamb<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old for a <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, and a <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeon<s%>, or a <S%H8449>turtle-dove<s%>, for a <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>, unto the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>, unto the <S%H3548>priest<s%>:

and he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for <S%H2891>her<s%>; and she shall be cleansed from the <S%H4726>fountain<s%> of her <S%H1818>blood<s%>. This is the <S%H8451>law<s%> for her that <S%H3205>beareth<s%>, whether a <S%H2145>male<s%> or a <S%H5347>female<s%>.

And if her means suffice not <S%H1767>for<s%> a <S%H7716>lamb<s%>, then she shall take <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8449>turtle-doves<s%>, or <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons<s%>; the <S%H259>one<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, and the <S%H259>other<s%> for a <S%H5930>sin-offering<s%>: and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for <S%H2891>her<s%>, and she shall be clean.
